website_summaries.verdict: This full-size, durable beam will help your gymnast take her practice to the next level at home.
pros: Measures eight feet long and seven inches high, with a four-inch work surface
Cross-link PE foam padding like competition beams
Synthetic suede covering gives the look and feel of competition beams
cons: Synthetic suede covering is easier to tear than expected

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well built. My daughter is a level 5 gymnasts and has utilized this to improver her skills. Her baby cousins also love using the beam when they visit. Whether you're purchasing this as a means to improve gymnastics skills competitively or to improve gross motor skills recreationally, it will serve either need. The packaging was also very good. The length is ideal for the home for it isn't overly long like the actual gymnastics beams.
customer_reviews.author: School Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Good Price - Awesome for your gymnast!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I bought it for my 7 year old who had started gymnastics. It was the most realistic and reasonably priced one that I found. I keep it in my living room for her to use anytime. I cant think of anything wrong with it, it is sturdy, well made, good fabric, nice color, close to the ground so we don't even use a mat. If we get tired of it in the living room then we just stand it up in the corner of a bedroom or closet.
customer_reviews.author: TXBelle

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive with this product. so glad that I decided to buy this beam. Well worth every dime. Very STABILIZE IT. Very well made. My gymnastics is 5 yrs old and 12. they both can use it and I when to school on a gymnastic scholarship and I can use it too!..lol.. Top quality, nicely padded. I HAVE PEICE OF MIND While my girls are working on it. I LOVE THIS PRODUCT ❤️
customer_reviews.author: R. Hisle

customer_reviews.title: This is a great practice beam
customer_reviews.text: This is a great practice beam. I wanted my daughter to have the ability to practice her skills and routines at home, and this is perfect for that. She has used this through level 4, and aside from dismounts, she should be able to use it for a while longer. In addition, my younger kids have a great time balancing and walking back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy duty beam!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love this beam. Its sturdy enough that my husband and I can even walk across it. The pink is really cute. My only complaint is the caps on the leg alway pop off. If you had this on a wood floor it could scrap the wood. You probably could glue the caps on or something to eliminate that issue. Also, this is really pretty heavy. My husband has to move it. I can, but it's heavier than I would like for myself.
customer_reviews.author: slingshot3000

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my 10 year old daughter. She takes gymnastics and she's been begging for a beam for months. She loves this. The legs were easy to put on with a wrench, and it's very sturdy. The suede is nice and soft, though only time will tell if it stays that way. It's fairly heavy, so you'd want to put it somewhere that it can stay put.
customer_reviews.author: RedRedtheycallmeRed

customer_reviews.title: Very good beam
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a level 2 gymnast, and she needed a beam on which to practice. This one is really great. Full-sized, well built, and covered in a durable material. Overall, very satisfied. Comes in a giant box, so be ready.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great for preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: This was a great value for the money. My 3- and 5-year-old girls use it to practice their gymnastics between lessons. At this point, they just do basic skills, but it is substantial enough that they'll be able to practice walk-overs and such as their skill level advances. It is suitably heavy and the suede cover is just like the practice beams at their gym.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Lin

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together (just 4 screws to put the ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter got it for christmas and she LOVES it! It was easy to put together (just 4 screws to put the legs on) and appears to be well made. The suede is really soft, though my only criticism is that it's not as "smooth" as a competition beam -i.e. "stickier" - harder to turn, if that makes sense. My daughter is thrilled though and has been on it almost every moment since Santa left it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice

customer_reviews.title: The beam is nice & heavy
customer_reviews.text: The beam is nice & heavy, covered with what appears to be quality suede-like fabric. Arrived as promised, in perfect condition, well packaged. However, my 10 year old gymnast needs the longer version in order to practice walk overs and cartwheels (she is tall), so we are returning this one for the exact same product in the 12 ft version. Costly return shipping, so if debating between the 8 ft & 12 ft, go with the longer one, if your gymnast has any height on her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality, durable Balance Beam
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter loves this product, it closely resembles the quality of what is found where her gymnastic team practices. It' built well as is perfectly stable when assembled. The 8' box arrived in good shape, the only minor issue we had is when removed from the box there were wood shavings all over the length of the blue cover. A quick two minute visit with the sweeper fixed that. If you have a child that is serious about gymnastics, trust the Beam Store, quality is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Beam
customer_reviews.text: Very nice beam. Beware, it is heavy! We put something under the legs per other reviews so we didn't scratch up the floors. It's very similar to what my daughter uses at the gym. Great for practices on the beam but since it's low to the ground - no dismount practice
customer_reviews.author: Keri Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ok for basics, company doesn't tell complete details
customer_reviews.text: When I contacted this store they shared that adjustable legs could be purchased to raise this up to 18" and now I cannot find these adjustable legs. So the beam is nice, but only for learning the very basics. Also the legs are not as heavy as was shared with me and if a child is much over $125 the ends will pop up if you go to far to the end.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for aspiring gymnasts!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for practicing at home. It's heavy enough to perform tricks without it tipping over, but I can pick it up with a little muscle and move it out of the way when I need to put it away. Covering is soft for feet, width is regulation size for most gyms.
customer_reviews.author: Ash D

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!  Great size and feel for a gymnast.
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my 9 year old daughter. She recently made a competitive level gymnastics team, level 4, and bean has been one of her weakest events. I inquired with other moms of upper level gymnasts and they said this was the right size, and a GREAT price (including the shipping charges) for a competitive level gymnast to use at home. My daughter was thrilled with the beam, not to mention amazed with the color that matches her room. After only a couple of weeks her teachers have commented on small improvements they notices her making on her own!
customer_reviews.author: T. Distaso

customer_reviews.title: Feels like the beams at gymnastics!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 10 and she says it feels just like the beams at gymnastics. My husband think it will be easy to make the beam higher if we choose to down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a great purchase for my 8 yr old gymnast
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for my 8 yr old gymnast . Quality is excellent durable. the only gripe I have about it is the end caps on the stands can come off pretty easily and when my daughter missed the beam doing a cartwheel she scratched her foot. But it is nothing that affects the quality of this beam
customer_reviews.author: Susan  S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent practice beam
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect beam for practicing routines. My daughter loves it & her scores on beam have gone up!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hooten

customer_reviews.title: High quality, pro grade beam!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, pro grade beam! Must have if you ahve a little gymnast in the house and you have the space. FYI...this is a large beam so read the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan E. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Beam - My Daughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, nice material coating the wooden beam. Light enough my daughter can drag it out into the yard and practice.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great for most ages
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bean for most levels. My oldest daughter is on a competition team and is able to work on her skills while my younger two (one being a toddler) love to play on this as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kim LW

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It well made, pretty high quality product. I bought it for my daughter who is 10 y. level 5 gymnast (moving up) to practice at home. My major concern was if it is long enough to practice major skills. To my surprise 8ft is sufficient to practice back walkover etc.
customer_reviews.author: RunFar

customer_reviews.title: Best beam!!
customer_reviews.text: This beam is very well constricted. Very sturdy, the suede like material is very smooth, nicely padded, legs strong, and color nice. We have the grey and it matches nicely with our grey decor. My daughter has been using this daily to practice gymnastics and she has become so much more confident on beam just in a month.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D.

customer_reviews.title: Feel is different, but beam is OK
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! As described, and on time. It is in very good shape. The feel is NOT the same as the normal gymnastics beam. That was a bit of a surprise. Not the best for practicing 180 360 540 and 720 moves, for example.
customer_reviews.author: jeff b.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Beam, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Nice beam. Feels like a comp beam, maybe just a tad softer. I bought it from the Amazon wharehouse as “as new”. Unfortunately it didn’t come with the bolts. Called the company directly and they were awesome and are sending new ones at no charge!
customer_reviews.author: KobiK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome practice beam
customer_reviews.text: My 5 and 11 year old granddaughters love this beam. Perfect for practicing their routines on. A full 8' long.
customer_reviews.author: B. Goin

customer_reviews.title: just what we hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is safe not to far off the ground. Well padded , stable and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lininger

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Balance Beam
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my granddaughter to practice her gymnastics while visiting my house.
customer_reviews.author: G. Munson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beam! We got it as a footrest for ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome beam! We got it as a footrest for our bar because my wife is a former collegiate gymnast and judge. It’s a great conversation piece and fits in well at our bar!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great for practicing on in between weekly classes
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 12 yr. old daughter who started taking gymnastics recently. She really likes it . Great for practicing on in between weekly classes. Safe, well built.
customer_reviews.author: 65stew

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made, sturdy beam. I like the quality but I would not recommend this beam for young beginners, since the sides are not as well padded as the top and it is a few inches off the floor. My daughter is preparing to test for level 2 and she has received a few good shin bangs from practicing on it.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy. This was the third one I purchased and ...
customer_reviews.text: My niece is an 11 year old gymnast and she loves that she can practice on this bar. It's very sturdy. This was the third one I purchased and it felt the safest to me. I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sdbernier

customer_reviews.title: Small tear early on, well made otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Small tear at one end after a week. My daughter said a friend had her shoes on while using the beam and did it. Beam looks well made otherwise, and is sturdy. Slightly overpriced based on the fact that it has developed a small tear so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Young

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased thus far!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the beam in July 2016 for my granddaughter's 6 birthday. I had previously read the reviews on it and most were good with only a few complaints. I compared the reviews to those of other beams and found that overall it was rated higher so I purchased it. My granddaughter loves it and has been very happy thus far. I am pleased that it continues to be sturdy and safe.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Well made and super strong
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, durable and hours of fun for my daughter! Made of great materials, I can see this lasting a long time.
customer_reviews.author: glxtrix

customer_reviews.title: A Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great practice beam for home--it is extremely sturdy, feels like the beams at the gym (according to my daughter), and is easy to move around when we need to. Has definitely helped with learning some of the more difficult skills before transitioning to the higher competition beam. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: tgirl

customer_reviews.title: The top is really soft and it's kind of wobbly ...
customer_reviews.text: The top is really soft and it's kind of wobbly on our hardwood floor. I'm not sure if it's our floors (since they are a little distressed) or if it's the legs. My daughter is 5 and it works okay for what she needs it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Beam seems Good but Beam Store customer service unresponsive
customer_reviews.text: Beam came with a rip in fabric on end of beam. Contacted the Beam Store directly to ask advice for repairing this rip or if they sold some sort of fabric repair kit a(returning the beam for a new one would be a real pain) but had zero response. I emailed and called a few times. Beam seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Only purple

customer_reviews.title: Great beam! Perfect size for home use and practice
customer_reviews.text: Great beam! Perfect size for home use and practice. I have seen a huge difference in my 10 year old gymnastics skills now that she can practice at home and she loves the color.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Mom

customer_reviews.title: Quality balance beam
customer_reviews.text: This is a substantial product. Kids should be careful about ripping fabric covering, but is holding up to 'normal' wear and tear (9 months since purchase). It is rather heavy and kids shouldn't move it themselves. Great for 'basement' gymnasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every young gymnasts needs one
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the perfect gift for a young gymnast. My daughter is a level 3 competitive gymnast and this is what she needed to build her confidence with handstands. She loves the color and it was Easy assembly. Great buy & fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: sassiness

customer_reviews.title: Santa scored big time on This one!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our little 6 YO gymnast. She received this for Christmas and hasn’t stopped playing on it since!
customer_reviews.author: Megan W.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this beam for any who want more practice at home
customer_reviews.text: This beam seems very sturdy and was easy to setup. It took me less than 10 minutes to put together with a socket wrench and it seems well built.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice practice beam
customer_reviews.text: This beam arrived quickly and in good shape. Set up was simple and was ready to use in minutes. Very surprised on the quality versus the price. Well worth the money. Will support adult weight. (Mom & Dad tried it out before we gave it to our daughter for Easter) We had some nice plush carpet & padding that we placed under the beam area to cover concrete floor. We also used some small foam squares to cover the steel feet of the beam. It was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Riner Hunter

customer_reviews.title: great beam, but arrived with a small tear
customer_reviews.text: My gymnast daughters are thrilled with the beam, except for the small rip in the fabric on one of the ends. Returning and replacing. It stinks that it is damaged, because my girls would love to be able to keep it! If not for the tear, I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice padding on the top of the beam and is very easy to set up!! Fabric is not the same as the gym beams, but it is very soft!!
customer_reviews.author: C Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great for practicing in their garage
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my granddaughter who loves it! Great for practicing in their garage. We like that it can be raised as she grows.
customer_reviews.author: J. Olive

customer_reviews.title: A REAL BALANCE BEAM
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, heavy beam. My daughter just started on the competition team, but I can imagine any age could do any skill on this. I purchased a fold-up beam first and sent it back after seeing that it was much too soft to really do much on it. This is what I consider a "real beam", appropriate for all skill levels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: My daughters are using this beam now daily :) I like the quality, and as to me this is a good beam for home use. I did not give 5 stars only because my daughters say the beam is slippery - may be because it is the combination of soft top+suede(material) instead of just wood. May be it would be better just to have a beam made from wood only - as the real gymnastics beam. But since it was my choice to go with suede covered one, I do not blame the company. Just not 5 star happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Freed

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old, level 3 gymnast loves this beam. It's sturdy and good quality. We had an issue with delivery (post office's fault, not Amazon's) and Amazon was quick and helpful in helping me figure out the issue. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality and looks beautiful . It is heavy and feels premium.
customer_reviews.author: moutain explorer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: well worth the price... my daughter loves it! she works with it all the time since it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Solid Quaility!!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old daughter LOVED this purple 8ft balance beam!! She is an intermediate gymnast and she is absolutely ecstatic!! Extremely high quality product! Very high quality build and excellent suede covering!
customer_reviews.author: R. Boron

customer_reviews.title: Great beam for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very good quality. I have two young gymnasts and they love this beam! They are constantly practicing their beam routines on it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Kline

customer_reviews.title: Suede Purple Balance Beam
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we wanted for our grandchildren, the only thing that could make it better is to have the feet/stand a little softer for when they jump off the end and walk around to get back on, they tend to trip or stub their feet on the metal, would be softer if it was made of a heavy solid plastic or velt covered.
customer_reviews.author: NANA I AM

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and is exactly as pictured. I first ordered from a different store and had to return the package because it was damaged during transit. This one was packaged much better and assembly was easy. Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected - very happy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this beam for my 7 year old beginner. This beam is extremely steady and very high quality. After reading reviews if less expensive beams, I'm very happy we spent the extra money on this one. Will also be able to get legs for this to make it higher once she's ready.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Estes

customer_reviews.title: Had it a year and it is still looking good.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves to practice gymnastics on this. I put some mats on the side to prevent injuries, even though it is close to the ground. Had it a year and it is still looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of the product. The suede surface is very soft and durable. Quality construction and it can even support adults, although we aren't very good. Our daughters are very happy with balance beam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my for year old and it's perfect. I ordered it with the Soozier mat, the black and pink one and it matches perfect with the beam. She isn't using it much yet but as she advances in gymnastics class she will. It's sturdy let me tell ya. :) I walk on it sometimes to try to get her to be more active on it and it holds me & I'm over 150 lbs. great purchase. Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this. It currently resides in our ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. It currently resides in our living room along with a tumbling mat.
customer_reviews.author: TaraLoo

customer_reviews.title: Great Beam
customer_reviews.text: Beam arrived early and was in great condition. The beam was sold as used but it was actually new. The box was a little worn but I seen packages in worst condition using the postal system. My daughter is a higher level gymnast and the beam was perfect for practicing difficult routines on a lower beam.
customer_reviews.author: Hotmom

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present. My daughter had been begging for a floor beam. After reading reviews decided to spend a little more and buy one that is used in gymnastics class. Turned out to be the perfect choice. Every day it is used and already have seen a boost in confidence on the beam. Love the fact it's only 7" off the floor. Very sturdy, durable and doesn't slide. Highly recommend this item if you are searching for a beam.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: 8-Ft. Beam for Gymnast
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my gymnast granddaughter for one Christmas. She loved it and uses it regularly to practice her beam routines.
customer_reviews.author: Lana S. Lecroy

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it. Good beam for a novice gymnast to ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Good beam for a novice gymnast to develop her craft. Also good for balance training for the rest of the family and for use in indoor obstacle courses.
customer_reviews.author: Brent L Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice - good quality, looks and feels like a real beam, sturdy, my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: W. Eric Williams

customer_reviews.title: The beam didn't come with screws or the correct size ...
customer_reviews.text: The beam didn't come with screws or the correct size of screw to purchase. You need to attach the "legs" that rest on the ground with screws and I tried the various screws I had at home and none fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Stein

customer_reviews.title: Our daughters love this!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughters are both in gymnastics and they love that we were able to find a quality bar that they could use at home. It was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RyanK

customer_reviews.title: Great Beam
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with sturdiness and feel of beam. Very happy with product!
customer_reviews.author: EdS

customer_reviews.title: the box looked like it had been through a war zone
customer_reviews.text: The Beam arrived, the box looked like it had been through a war zone. This being said, no screws were in the box to attach the legs to the beam. A trip to Home Depot and two dollars more, and that was solved.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S

customer_reviews.title: She can practice some daring moves on the fast and in good condition. low beam before she tries them on ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this beam. She can practice some daring moves on the fast and in good condition.low beam before she tries them on the higher beam at gymnastics. It arrived
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great Beam / No footings
customer_reviews.text: The beam is great with a solid wooden core and suede covering. This supplier did not send the footings. Priced more than the beam itself, I decided to make my own.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C. McCutcheon

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's 7th birthday. She loves it. We got this one because we plan on keeping it in the basement with a mat under it. That setup is working just fine. It is just long enough for her to practice on but still have the feel of the real thing on her feet. It is well constructed and I think it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff McCune

customer_reviews.title: and it still looks great after nine months of use
customer_reviews.text: It's really getting a workout in my granddaughter's living room. She loves it, and it still looks great after nine months of use. This was a great at-home practice tool for improving technique.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great Beam
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7 yo that is in competitive gym. This was a delight for her to recieve. She loves it and can't get enough of it. The low legs give her a lot of security but do not allow her to practice mounts and dismounts.
customer_reviews.author: fullhouseof9

customer_reviews.title: awesome beam!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome beam! My daughter fell in love with gymnastics and we got her this for her birthday. It is really big but if you have room for it, it's very sturdy and she got a lot of practice with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wonderful piece of equipment - good quality - on time delivery
customer_reviews.author: james wyrick

customer_reviews.title: The beam is beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The beam is beautiful and sturdy. She has used it thru the end of the season and is now headed to the state competition! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Monique N. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: They can't stop...
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift for my nieces and they just can't stop using it. They have even tried to sneak it into their bedroom so they can use it more frequently. They both have improved in their routines and their scores at meets.
customer_reviews.author: spincast1123

customer_reviews.title: great beam
customer_reviews.text: my daughter wanted a beam for at home and this is the one i had decided to purchase .....no regrets!it is very well made high quality very sturdy not cheap looking materials are great and constructed well!shipped on time easy to assemble within 5 mins of opening box
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. The leg covers do slide off each ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. The leg covers do slide off each time my daughters move it around. That's annoying, but we just keep putting them back on.
customer_reviews.author: smalltowngirlz

customer_reviews.title: it came at exactly as it was described we are very pleased with
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it.... it came at exactly as it was described we are very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice beam
customer_reviews.text: Great beam- no problems at all. My daughter practices all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Robin568

customer_reviews.title: ... I had been asking for gymnastics stuff because I love gymnastics and it is really good to start getting ...
customer_reviews.text: So My grandma got me a beam for my birthday because I had been asking for gymnastics stuff because I love gymnastics and it is really good to start getting good at my back handspring on beam and my Ariel so I love the color and the size and it is light not to heavy for me to carry by my self but I think it is easier to have someone else help me but I rate 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice beam- not fond of the color (lime green)- easily ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice beam- not fond of the color (lime green)- easily detected dirt... my daughter likes it and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: RI_RN♡

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beam for home use
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful home balance beam for my emerging gymnast! Easy to put legs on. Shipped fast and packaged well. The tan beam is a little darker than the beams at our gym and meets. Might have gone with a girly color to match her playroom had I known it wouldn't have been an exact match to the color of the beams she practices and competes on.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Reagan

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and exactly as expected. everyone in the family (even dad) can walk on it without any sag. Assembly was easy (my 12 year old put it together).
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Doll

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my five kids and it is a hit! The beam itself actually seems to be covered in a fabric that seems more like a thick felt than suede, but either way it feels pretty sturdy. I have a feeling we will have this for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tricky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beam
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality with great pattern. Perfect for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ballecer

customer_reviews.title: Its works great. My daughter is an x-cel gymnast and she ...
customer_reviews.text: Its works great. My daughter is an x-cel gymnast and she uses the beam after school and before practice. We couldn't have asked for a better beam. It is very sturdy. My daughter uses it for back walk overs cartwheels handstands ticktocks conditioning and her dismounts. This is a great beam I definetly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Fahey

customer_reviews.title: The beam itself is great, but the fabric covering tore (almost like it ...
customer_reviews.text: The beam itself is great, but the fabric covering tore (almost like it was too thin) less than 24 hours after we opened and my daughter (who is a gymnast) starting to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhietta Price

customer_reviews.title: Pink Suede 8-foot Gymnastice Balance Beam is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters (4 years and 21 months) both love it! It sits close to the floor so even if they fall off, no crying. The bright pink is both cheery and easy to see. I would recommend this for kids of all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Laratea

customer_reviews.title: Very nice beam. Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice beam. Excellent quality. Easy to assemble. My daughter is 6 & she is still a beginner. This is perfect for her & I think it wil continue to work great as she advances. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: sginn

customer_reviews.title: Great for young gymnasts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this beam for my daughter, because she was upset about not having anything to practice on at home and "the beam hates me." She's thrilled with this beam. It's two inches off the ground, which means I can place our 2-inch mat underneath for safety. She says it's just like the one at the gym except it's a little more "fuzzy" (i.e., suede). It's a good length, padded, very sturdy. Even I could stand on it without worries. My daughter practices her handstands, dismounts and other skills on her new beam every day. I can see improvements already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and room to grow as she gets older/ taller / better at beam
customer_reviews.text: granddaughter loves it... and room to grow as she gets older/ taller / better at beam activities
customer_reviews.author: Janet Cross

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It's not long enough to do flips, but it's made very well, sturdy and the suede is great on the feet. It's worth the price. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: randi shamitz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our girls to practice on. They aren't training to be elite gymnasts but it is still the same quality as they find at their gym. My daughters are learning to do cartwheels on the beam and we have this and a mat that they love playing on.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great - looks good too
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it was going to be a piece of nothing. My daughter loves to just keep going back and forth on this while she watches tv. It gives her a good sense of balance and helps to build up the core. I have been using it too - very stable and the color is fabulous
customer_reviews.author: Mich NJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our daughter and were very pleased with the packaging, ease of assembly and the quality. The beam is solid, has adequate padding and the cover material is of good quaility.
customer_reviews.author: Webster19

customer_reviews.title: Made my daughter's Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: This was the highlight of my 9-year old daughter's Christmas. It's a heavy and sturdy beam that is easy to move. The rubber ends of the feet sometimes slide off, but otherwise it is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: JLT

product_meta.title: The Beam Store 8' Suede Balance Beam
feature_bullets: Wood-core, low profile balance beam for practice with 12-inch wide supports
Beam measures 8 feet long and 7 inches high with a 4 inch work surface
Heavy-grade synthetic suede covering provides look and feel of a competition beam
1/4" Cross Link PE Foam Padding (Same padding used on Competition Beams) with rounded competition shaped sides
8 ft. Long x 4 in. wide x 7 in. high
